reg_pit.title: Transportation and Infrastructure Collections Commission Regulation

change.changenote: Regulation Title BEFORE amended by BC Reg 4/2010, effective January 14, 2010.
change.title: Transportation and Highways Collections Commission Regulation

change.changenote: Section 1 BEFORE amended by BC Reg 4/2010, effective January 14, 2010.

section.sectiontext: A person who is retained under contract with the Ministry of Transportation and Highways to collect overdue fines accounts receivable

paragraph.paragraphtext: may be authorized to retain a fee or commission from the amounts actually collected, or
may be paid out of consolidated revenue fund a fee or commission

section.subsandwich: calculated under section 2 and provided for under the contract.
